CMT|Interview with authors Mark Halperin and John Heilemann re book GAME CHANGE
LAN|ENG
LBT|2010-12-29 01:22 America/Los_Angeles
20101229092401.000|20101229102330.000|SEG|Type=Story
20101229092401.000|20101229092405.000|CC1|>> "WASHINGTON JOURNAL"         
20101229092405.000|20101229092407.000|CC1|CONTINUES.                      
20101229092407.000|20101229092408.000|CC1|HOST: WE ARE JOINED BY THE      
20101229092408.000|20101229092412.000|CC1|AUTHORS OF "GAME CHANGE," AND   
20101229092412.000|20101229092416.000|CC1|JOHN HEILEMANN AND MARK         
20101229092416.000|20101229092417.000|CC1|HALPERIN.                       
20101229092417.000|20101229092419.000|CC1|IT YOU HAVE A LIST THINGS THAT  
20101229092419.000|20101229092421.000|CC1|YOU THOUGHT WOULD MAKE USE IN   
20101229092421.000|20101229092423.000|CC1|THIS BOOK WHAT ON THAT LIST HAS 
20101229092423.000|20101229092425.000|CC1|NOT MADE NEWS, OR WHAT ARE YOU  
20101229092425.000|20101229092426.000|CC1|SURPRISED AT?                   
20101229092426.000|20101229092429.000|CC1|GUEST: A LOT OF THINGS.         
20101229092429.000|20101229092430.000|CC1|WHEN JOHN AND I SET OUT TO WRITE
20101229092430.000|20101229092432.000|CC1|THE BOOK, WE HOPE IT WOULD BE   
20101229092432.000|20101229092433.000|CC1|INTERESTING BOOK TO READ AN     
20101229092433.000|20101229092436.000|CC1|INTERESTING STORY.              
20101229092436.000|20101229092438.000|CC1|BUT WE WERE ALSO GOING FOR      
20101229092438.000|20101229092439.000|CC1|BREAKING NEWS BECAUSE WE THOUGHT
20101229092439.000|20101229092440.000|CC1|THERE WERE THINGS THAT WERE     
20101229092440.000|20101229092443.000|CC1|UNCOVERED DURING THE CAMPAIGN.  
20101229092443.000|20101229092444.000|CC1|I WILL GIVE YOU ONE.            
20101229092444.000|20101229092446.000|CC1|JOHN WILL HAVE OTHERS.          
20101229092446.000|20101229092448.000|CC1|SARAH PALIN WAS PICKED BY JOHN  
20101229092448.000|20101229092451.000|CC1|MCCAIN AND PEOPLE WERE SHOCKED  
20101229092451.000|20101229092452.000|CC1|WHEN IT HAPPENED TO THAT TIME,  
20101229092452.000|20101229092453.000|CC1|THE CAMPAIGN SAID THAT SHE HAD  
20101229092453.000|20101229092455.000|CC1|BEEN ON CONSIDERATION FOR A LONG
20101229092455.000|20101229092458.000|CC1|TIME AND RECEIVE AS MUCH OF A   
20101229092458.000|20101229092500.000|CC1|BACKGROUND CHECK, SO-CALLED     
20101229092500.000|20101229092502.000|CC1|VETTING, AS ANY OF THE OTHER    
20101229092502.000|20101229092503.000|CC1|PEOPLE JOHN MCCAIN CONSIDERED.  
20101229092503.000|20101229092506.000|CC1|THERE IS SKEPTICISM ABOUT THAT  
20101229092506.000|20101229092509.000|CC1|AT THE TIME DID NOT OF THE      
20101229092509.000|20101229092510.000|CC1|POLITICAL JOURNALISM PARADE     
20101229092510.000|20101229092511.000|CC1|MOVED ON AND THERE WERE OTHER   
20101229092511.000|20101229092512.000|CC1|THINGS TO COVER.                
20101229092512.000|20101229092514.000|CC1|-- THERE WAS SKEPTICISM ABOUT   
20101229092514.000|20101229092515.000|CC1|THAT AT THE TIME IT.            
20101229092515.000|20101229092517.000|CC1|BUT THE POLITICAL JOURNALS A    
20101229092517.000|20101229092518.000|CC1|GREAT MOVE ON AND THERE WERE    
20101229092518.000|20101229092521.000|CC1|OTHER THINGS TO COVER.          
20101229092521.000|20101229092522.000|CC1|THE TRUTH IS THAT SHE WAS       
20101229092522.000|20101229092524.000|CC1|BROUGHT INTO THE GAME A VERY    
20101229092524.000|20101229092529.000|CC1|LATE AFTER THEIR MAIN FOCUS, JOE
20101229092529.000|20101229092530.000|CC1|LIEBERMAN, FELL APART AS AN     
20101229092530.000|20101229092531.000|CC1|OPTION.                         
20101229092531.000|20101229092533.000|CC1|THEY NEEDED A GAME CHANGING     
20101229092533.000|20101229092534.000|CC1|PICK AND JOE LIEBERMAN WAS AGAIN
20101229092534.000|20101229092536.000|CC1|CHANGING THE OF ONE SORT AND    
20101229092536.000|20101229092538.000|CC1|SARAH PALIN WAS ANOTHER.        
20101229092538.000|20101229092544.000|CC1|IN BOOK, WE QUOTE THE VETTING A 
20101229092544.000|20101229092545.000|CC1|REPORT BY WASHINGTON LAWYER WHO 
20101229092545.000|20101229092546.000|CC1|WAS TOLD ON A FRIDAY AFTERNOON  
20101229092546.000|20101229092548.000|CC1|TO GET READY AND IN THE SPACE OF
20101229092548.000|20101229092550.000|CC1|LESS THAN TWO DAYS LOOK INTO    
20101229092550.000|20101229092553.000|CC1|SARAH PALIN'S BACKGROUND, NOT BY
20101229092553.000|20101229092554.000|CC1|MAKING A PHONE CALL OR          
20101229092554.000|20101229092555.000|CC1|INTERVIEWING ANYBODY, BUT SIMPLY
20101229092555.000|20101229092557.000|CC1|BY DOING ON-LINE SEARCHES,      
20101229092557.000|20101229092559.000|CC1|BECAUSE THEY NEEDED TO KEEP IT  
20101229092559.000|20101229092600.000|CC1|SECRET.                         
20101229092600.000|20101229092602.000|CC1|LOOKING AT THE PROCESS BY WHICH 
20101229092602.000|20101229092603.000|CC1|JOHN MCCAIN PICKED A VIRTUAL    
20101229092603.000|20101229092606.000|CC1|STRANGER AS HIS RUNNING MATE WAS
20101229092606.000|20101229092607.000|CC1|SOMETHING THAT WE THOUGHT THAT A
20101229092607.000|20101229092608.000|CC1|LOT OF ATTENTION.               
20101229092608.000|20101229092612.000|CC1|GUEST: THERE IS A TON OF STUFF  
20101229092612.000|20101229092613.000|CC1|OUT IN THE BOOK THAT WE THOUGHT 
20101229092613.000|20101229092614.000|CC1|WOULD HAVE GOTTEN A LOT OF      
20101229092614.000|20101229092615.000|CC1|ATTENTION.                      
20101229092615.000|20101229092617.000|CC1|I WILL GIVE YOU THREE EXAMPLES. 
20101229092617.000|20101229092621.000|CC1|ONE OF THEM IS A MACRO STORY.   
20101229092621.000|20101229092624.000|CC1|IN THE WAKE OF THE CAMPAIGN, ONE
20101229092624.000|20101229092625.000|CC1|OF THE PIECES OF CONVENTIONAL   
20101229092625.000|20101229092629.000|CC1|WISDOM THAT WAS COMPOUNDED BY   
20101229092629.000|20101229092631.000|CC1|THE OBAMA OPERATION, THE        
20101229092631.000|20101229092634.000|CC1|QUESTION OF RACE WAS SOMETHING  
20101229092634.000|20101229092635.000|CC1|THAT THEY DID NOT REALLY THINK  
20101229092635.000|20101229092636.000|CC1|ABOUT.                          
20101229092636.000|20101229092637.000|CC1|IT WAS NOT FACTORED INTO THE    
20101229092637.000|20101229092640.000|CC1|DECISION TO RUN, IT WAS A NON-  
20101229092640.000|20101229092641.000|CC1|ISSUE.                          
20101229092641.000|20101229092642.000|CC1|THAT WAS ONE OF THE THINGS THEY 
20101229092642.000|20101229092643.000|CC1|SAID OVER AND OVER AGAIN AFTER  
20101229092643.000|20101229092645.000|CC1|HIS ELECTION.                   
20101229092645.000|20101229092647.000|CC1|THROUGHOUT THE BOOK, WE TALK    
20101229092647.000|20101229092653.000|CC1|ABOUT HOW MUCH THEY WERE IN     
20101229092653.000|20101229092655.000|CC1|FACT AND OBSESSED WITH RACE AS A
20101229092655.000|20101229092658.000|CC1|POLITICAL FACTOR.               
20101229092658.000|20101229092702.000|CC1|IT PRODUCED ADVERTISEMENT AFTER 
20101229092702.000|20101229092704.000|CC1|ADVERTISEMENT, FAKE ADS THAT    
20101229092704.000|20101229092706.000|CC1|THEY THOUGHT THE MCCAIN CAMPAIGN
20101229092706.000|20101229092709.000|CC1|WOULD RUN AGAINST THEM THAT     
20101229092709.000|20101229092710.000|CC1|WOULD BE RACIALLY FRAME AND HOW 
20101229092710.000|20101229092712.000|CC1|THEY WOULD RESPOND TO THAT.     
20101229092712.000|20101229092715.000|CC1|IT WAS TOPIC A --               
20101229092715.000|20101229092718.000|CC1|HOST: LET ME SHOW YOUR VIEW IS  
20101229092718.000|20101229092719.000|CC1|THAT WHAT ABOUT WHAT YOU TALK   
20101229092719.000|20101229092721.000|CC1|ABOUT THAT.                     
20101229092721.000|20101229092722.000|CC1|"WHILE CASH FROM THE MCCAIN     
20101229092722.000|20101229092726.000|CC1|CAMPAIGN WAS COMING UP WITH     
20101229092726.000|20101229092728.000|CC1|NEGATIVE ADS ON THE FLY,        
20101229092728.000|20101229092729.000|CC1|SCRIBBLING SCRIPPS, IN FACT, ON 
20101229092729.000|20101229092731.000|CC1|THE BACKS OF NAPKINS, THE OBAMA 
20101229092731.000|20101229092734.000|CC1|CAMPAIGN WAS DETERMINING WHICH  
20101229092734.000|20101229092737.000|CC1|ONES WERE MOST DANGEROUS AND TO 
20101229092737.000|20101229092739.000|CC1|DEVELOP RESPONSES."             
20101229092739.000|20101229092741.000|CC1|GUEST: THE PRODUCED DOZENS UPON 
20101229092741.000|20101229092744.000|CC1|DOZENS OF SPOTS, AND ALSO TO    
20101229092744.000|20101229092747.000|CC1|LOOK AT THOSE ADS TO BE PREPARED
20101229092747.000|20101229092749.000|CC1|TO RESPOND THAN AND OTHER SPOTS 
20101229092749.000|20101229092750.000|CC1|THAT WOULD DEAL WITH THE        
20101229092750.000|20101229092752.000|CC1|PROBLEM.                        
20101229092752.000|20101229092755.000|CC1|THE QUESTION OF WHAT WOULD      
20101229092755.000|20101229092758.000|CC1|OBAMA'S ALLEGED CONNECTIONS TO  
20101229092758.000|20101229092802.000|CC1|MUSLIMISM -- THE OBAMA CAMPAIGN 
20101229092802.000|20101229092805.000|CC1|WAS CONSTANTLY TRYING TO        
20101229092805.000|20101229092806.000|CC1|RESPOND.                        
20101229092806.000|20101229092807.000|CC1|WE HAVE A GREAT ANECDOTE WORKED 
20101229092807.000|20101229092808.000|CC1|AT ONE POINT THE OBAMA CAMPAIGN 
20101229092808.000|20101229092811.000|CC1|WAS TRYING TO PRODUCE AN AD THAT
20101229092811.000|20101229092813.000|CC1|WOULD TAKE CARE OF ALL THE      
20101229092813.000|20101229092814.000|CC1|QUESTIONS ABOUT HIS RACE, HIS   
20101229092814.000|20101229092819.000|CC1|ALLEGED MUSLIMISM, AND ALLEGED  
20101229092819.000|20101229092821.000|CC1|LACK OF PATRIOTISM ALL IN ONE   
20101229092821.000|20101229092823.000|CC1|AD THE SCRIPT OF THIS           
20101229092823.000|20101229092829.000|CC1|RIDICULOUS --AD -- THIS         
20101229092829.000|20101229092833.000|CC1|RIDICULOUS ADVERTISEMENT -- HE  
20101229092833.000|20101229092835.000|CC1|READ THE SCRIPT AND SAID, "THIS 
20101229092835.000|20101229092838.000|CC1|IS TOO MUCH."                   
20101229092838.000|20101229092840.000|CC1|ON THE FINANCIAL CRISIS,        
20101229092840.000|20101229092841.000|CC1|INCREDIBLE REPORTING, I         
20101229092841.000|20101229092843.000|CC1|BELIEVE, ABOUT WHAT HAPPENED IN 
20101229092843.000|20101229092845.000|CC1|THE WHITE HOUSE MEETING GEORGE  
20101229092845.000|20101229092847.000|CC1|BUSH HELD WITH JOHN MCCAIN AND  
20101229092847.000|20101229092848.000|CC1|BARACK OBAMA, HARDLY BEEN       
20101229092848.000|20101229092850.000|CC1|MENTIONED IN THE COVERAGE OF IT 
20101229092850.000|20101229092852.000|CC1|IS VERY INTERESTING BUT IT      
20101229092852.000|20101229092854.000|CC1|SHOWED HOW UNPREPARED JOHN      
20101229092854.000|20101229092856.000|CC1|MCCAIN WAS, HOW WELL PREPARED   
20101229092856.000|20101229092857.000|CC1|OBAMA WAS.                      
20101229092857.000|20101229092859.000|CC1|AS YOU LISTEN TO OBAMA TAKE OVER
20101229092859.000|20101229092900.000|CC1|THE MEETING, IT SEEMS THAT IF   
20101229092900.000|20101229092902.000|CC1|YOU CLOSE YOUR EYES, YOU WOULD  
20101229092902.000|20101229092903.000|CC1|BELIEVE THAT THIS IS THE        
20101229092903.000|20101229092904.000|CC1|PRESIDENT OF THE UNITED STATES, 
20101229092904.000|20101229092906.000|CC1|NOT GEORGE BUSH OR JOHN MCCAIN. 
20101229092906.000|20101229092907.000|CC1|WE HAVE A VERY INTERESTING STORY
20101229092907.000|20101229092911.000|CC1|ABOUT DAVID GEFFEN AND MAUREEN  
20101229092911.000|20101229092914.000|CC1|DOWD AND A DEVASTATING COLUMN   
20101229092914.000|20101229092916.000|CC1|THAT MAUREEN DOWD WROTE IN THE  
20101229092916.000|20101229092919.000|CC1|EARLY PART OF THE NOMINATION,   
20101229092919.000|20101229092924.000|CC1|HOW THAT CAME TO BE, HOW THIS   
20101229092924.000|20101229092927.000|CC1|HOLLYWOOD MOGUL AND THIS "NEW   
20101229092927.000|20101229092930.000|CC1|YORK TIMES" COLUMNIST BILL IS   
20101229092930.000|20101229092932.000|CC1|ONE OF THE FIRST BLOWS TO --    
20101229092932.000|20101229092936.000|CC1|DEALT ONE OF THE FIRST BLOWS TO 
20101229092936.000|20101229092937.000|CC1|HILLARY CLINTON'S INEVITABILITY.
20101229092937.000|20101229092940.000|CC1|HOST: SHE WAS TRYING TO WRITE   
20101229092940.000|20101229092941.000|CC1|THAT COLUMN BEFORE SHE GOT HIM  
20101229092941.000|20101229092944.000|CC1|TO AGREE TO DO IT.              
20101229092944.000|20101229092946.000|CC1|GUEST: AN INTERESTING CASE OF   
20101229092946.000|20101229092947.000|CC1|TWO NOT ONLY PROMINENT PEOPLE,  
20101229092947.000|20101229092949.000|CC1|BUT ICONIC PEOPLE, IT THE MOST  
20101229092949.000|20101229092952.000|CC1|PROMINENT "NEW YORK TIMES"      
20101229092952.000|20101229092957.000|CC1|COLUMN IS ABOUT TIME -- IT      
20101229092957.000|20101229093000.000|CC1|COLUMNIST OF OUR TIME, AND DAVID
20101229093000.000|20101229093001.000|CC1|GEFFEN, THIS INCREDIBLY         
20101229093001.000|20101229093004.000|CC1|INFLUENTIAL HOLLYWOOD FIGURE.   
20101229093004.000|20101229093014.000|CC1|HE WAS THE HEAD OF              
20101229093014.000|20101229093017.000|CC1|DREAMWORKS AND HE HAD TURNED    
20101229093017.000|20101229093019.000|CC1|AGAINST THE CLINTONS BUT HE WAS 
20101229093019.000|20101229093022.000|CC1|UNHAPPY WITH THE CLINTONS'      
20101229093022.000|20101229093026.000|CC1|CHOICE OF PARDONS, NOT GRANTING 
20101229093026.000|20101229093027.000|CC1|A PARDON THAT DAVID GEFFEN HAD  
20101229093027.000|20101229093030.000|CC1|LOBBIED FOR US.                 
20101229093030.000|20101229093032.000|CC1|DAVID GEFFEN HAD TURNED ON THE  
20101229093032.000|20101229093033.000|CC1|CLINTONS AND FELT THAT THEY     
20101229093033.000|20101229093035.000|CC1|WERE, IF NOT ACTUAL CROP, KIND  
20101229093035.000|20101229093037.000|CC1|OF MORALLY BANKRUPT.            
20101229093037.000|20101229093041.000|CC1|-- IF NOT ACTUALLY CORRUPT, KIND
20101229093041.000|20101229093042.000|CC1|OF MARLEIGH BACKUPS.            
20101229093042.000|20101229093046.000|CC1|HE LOVED OBAMA.                 
20101229093046.000|20101229093048.000|CC1|WHEN MAUREEN DOWD HURT EVEN     
20101229093048.000|20101229093051.000|CC1|GIVEN TO SPEAK IN NEW YORK --   
20101229093051.000|20101229093055.000|CC1|HEARD DAVID GEFFEN SPEAK IN NEW 
20101229093055.000|20101229093058.000|CC1|YORK, HE WAS VERY TOUGH ON BILL 
20101229093058.000|20101229093059.000|CC1|AND HILLARY CLINTON.            
20101229093059.000|20101229093102.000|CC1|MAUREEN IN THE AUDIENCE WAS     
20101229093102.000|20101229093104.000|CC1|STRUCK NOT ONLY BY HOW TOUGH HE 
20101229093104.000|20101229093106.000|CC1|WAS TALKING ABOUT CLINTON'S     
20101229093106.000|20101229093107.000|CC1|MORALITY, BUT HERE THEY WERE IN 
20101229093107.000|20101229093111.000|CC1|NEW YORK, THE STATE HILLARY     
20101229093111.000|20101229093113.000|CC1|CLINTON REPRESENTED, AND THE    
20101229093113.000|20101229093114.000|CC1|AUDIENCE SEEMED VERY            
20101229093114.000|20101229093115.000|CC1|ENTHUSIASTIC ABOUT THE NOTION OF
20101229093115.000|20101229093117.000|CC1|THAT CRITICISM OF HILLARY       
20101229093117.000|20101229093118.000|CC1|CLINTON.                        
20101229093118.000|20101229093121.000|CC1|OVER A LONG PERIOD OF TIME,     
20101229093121.000|20101229093124.000|CC1|MAUREEN WAS LOBBYING DAVID      
20101229093124.000|20101229093125.000|CC1|GEFFEN TO TAKE WHAT HE SAID AT  
20101229093125.000|20101229093127.000|CC1|THAT EVENT AND AMPLIFY IT IN AN 
20101229093127.000|20101229093130.000|CC1|INTERVIEW WITH.                 
20101229093130.000|20101229093132.000|CC1|SHE WAS IN CALIFORNIA AT THE    
20101229093132.000|20101229093134.000|CC1|NIGHT BEFORE DAVID GEFFEN WAS   
20101229093134.000|20101229093136.000|CC1|TO HOST A FUND-RAISER FOR BARACK
20101229093136.000|20101229093137.000|CC1|OBAMA AND SHE CONVINCES HIM TO  
20101229093137.000|20101229093138.000|CC1|DO THE INTERVIEW.               
20101229093138.000|20101229093142.000|CC1|HOST: WHAT YEAR IS THIS?        
20101229093142.000|20101229093144.000|CC1|GUEST: 2007.                    
20101229093144.000|20101229093146.000|CC1|BARACK OBAMA HAS GOTTEN INTO THE
20101229093146.000|20101229093148.000|CC1|RACE AND HAS CREATED A LOT OF   
20101229093148.000|20101229093149.000|CC1|EXCITEMENT, AND IN COMMUNITIES  
20101229093149.000|20101229093151.000|CC1|THAT ARE VITALLY IMPORTANT IF   
20101229093151.000|20101229093154.000|CC1|YOU ARE TRYING TO BECOME THE    
20101229093154.000|20101229093155.000|CC1|DEMOCRATIC NOMINEE FOR          
20101229093155.000|20101229093157.000|CC1|PRESIDENT, HOLLYWOOD, NEW YORK, 
20101229093157.000|20101229093200.000|CC1|LIBERAL CIRCLES, HILLARY WAS    
20101229093200.000|20101229093201.000|CC1|TRYING TO NOT LET OBAMA RISE UP 
20101229093201.000|20101229093203.000|CC1|AS A MAJOR COMPETITOR TO HER.   
20101229093203.000|20101229093204.000|CC1|FOR DAVID GIVEN TO AGREE TO HOST
20101229093204.000|20101229093208.000|CC1|THIS FUND-RAISER WAS A BIG BLOW 
20101229093208.000|20101229093210.000|CC1|TO THE CLINTONS BUT THEY WERE   
20101229093210.000|20101229093211.000|CC1|DESPERATE TO TRY TO OVERSHADOW  
20101229093211.000|20101229093212.000|CC1|THAT.                           
20101229093212.000|20101229093213.000|CC1|IT SHOWED THAT A HOLLYWOOD      
20101229093213.000|20101229093215.000|CC1|SUPPORT AND THE DEMOCRATIC PARTY
20101229093215.000|20101229093219.000|CC1|WOULD NOT BE MONOLITHIC.        
20101229093219.000|20101229093221.000|CC1|AGAIN, MAUREEN CONVINCES DAVID  
20101229093221.000|20101229093222.000|CC1|GEFFEN HAD TO DO THE INTERVIEW  
20101229093222.000|20101229093225.000|CC1|HER COLUMN GOES ON THE WEB, AND 
20101229093225.000|20101229093234.000|CC1|ROCK OBAMA AND -- AND OBAMA     
20101229093234.000|20101229093237.000|CC1|THEN HILLARY WERE AT THIS -- AND
20101229093237.000|20101229093239.000|CC1|OBAMA WAS AT THIS FUND-RAISER.  
20101229093239.000|20101229093241.000|CC1|IT DID NOT CAUSE ANY PROBLEMS   
20101229093241.000|20101229093242.000|CC1|FOR OBAMA.                      
20101229093242.000|20101229093244.000|CC1|AS WE REPORT IN THE BOOK, IT WAS
20101229093244.000|20101229093245.000|CC1|WORSE FOR THE CLINTON THAN THEY 
20101229093245.000|20101229093246.000|CC1|THOUGHT.                        
20101229093246.000|20101229093248.000|CC1|IT WAS THE FIRST TIME THAT A LOT
20101229093248.000|20101229093249.000|CC1|TO THE ISSUES OF BILL CLINTON'S 
20101229093249.000|20101229093251.000|CC1|PERSONAL LIFE, WHETHER THE      
20101229093251.000|20101229093252.000|CC1|CLINTONS WERE OLD POLITICS,
